caption: Ticket
description: The Ticket object represents ticket in the customer's IT Service Management (ITSM) systems like ServiceNow, Jira, etc.
name: ticket

src_url.description: The url of a ticket in the ticket system.

status.caption: Ticket Status
status.description: The status of the ticket normalized to the caption of the status_id value. In the case of 99, this value should as defined by the source.

status_id.caption: Ticket Status ID
status_id.description: The normalized identifier for the ticket status.

1.caption: New
1.description: The ticket is new and yet to be reviewed.

2.caption: In Progress
2.description: The ticket is actively being worked on.

3.caption: Notified
3.description: Relevant parties have been notified about the ticket.

4.caption: On Hold
4.description: Work on the ticket is temporarily suspended.

5.caption: Resolved
5.description: The ticket is resolved and a solution is implemented, pending confirmation or verification from the requestor.

6.caption: Closed
6.description: The ticket has been completed and closed.

7.caption: Canceled
7.description: The ticket has been canceled and will not be processed.

8.caption: Reopened
8.description: The ticket was previously closed, but has been reopened.

status_details.description: A list of contextual descriptions of the status, status_id values.

type.caption: Ticket Type
type.description: The linked ticket type determines whether the ticket is internal or in an external ticketing system.

type_id.caption: Ticket Type ID
type_id.description: The normalized identifier for the ticket type.
